name: Domestic R&D paid for by other companies and performed by the company, by funders' business activity: 2016
description: Domestic R&D paid for by other companies and performed by the company, by funders' business activity: 2016

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. For an R&D performer that did not report the R&D funders' business activities, no systematic imputation of these business activities was conducted. The business activities of the R&D funders may not be assumed to be the same as those of the R&D performer. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded R&D.
sources: National Science Foundation, National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, and U.S. Census Bureau, Business R&D and Innovation Survey, 2016.
